SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT094
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is the result of a system or user request to broadcast information. It is the response to an MT 074 Broadcast Request.
From: GPA or FIN To: User

SystemField.Name: broadcast-priority
SystemField.description: Priority must be U or N.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Broadcast Priority '" + $value + "'. Broadcast Priority should be either 'U' or 'N'."

SystemField.Name: broadcast-number users
SystemField.description: Broadcast number for broadcast sent to all users.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: broadcast-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Broadcast number for broadcast sent to all users.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Broadcast Number Sent To All Users '" + $value +"'"

SystemField.Name: broadcast-number countres
SystemField.description:
Broadcast number for broadcast sent to selected countries.
See tag 133 for details.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: broadcast-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Broadcast number for broadcast sent to selected countries.
See tag 133 for details.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Broadcast Number Sent To Selected Countries '" + $value + "'."
"Invalid Broadcast Number Sent To Selected Countries '" + $value + "'."
"Invalid Broadcast Number Sent To Selected Countries '" + $value + "'."

SystemField.Name: section-number
SystemField.description: Section # of # in a multi-section broadcast.

SystemField.Name: heading-code
SystemField.description:
Heading code line 1
Heading code line 2
IF (tag130:/09/ ...) or (tag 130:/23/ ...) is present, then tag 132 or 133 but not both, must be used.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: heading-code
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Heading code line 1
Heading code line 2
IF (tag130:/09/ ...) or (tag 130:/23/ ...) is present, then tag 132 or 133 but not both, must be used.

SystemField.Name: original-broadcast-number users
SystemField.description:
Original broadcast number for broadcast sent to all users.
Tag 132 can only be present if tag 130:/09/ or tag 130:/32/ is present.
Tag 132 may be repeated.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: original-broadcast-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Original broadcast number for broadcast sent to all users.
Tag 132 can only be present if tag 130:/09/ or tag 130:/32/ is present.
Tag 132 may be repeated.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Original Broadcast Number Sent To All Users '" + $value + "'"

SystemField.Name: original-broadcast-number countries
SystemField.description:
Original broadcast number for broadcast sent to selected countries
Tag 133 can only be present if tag 130:/09/ or tag 130:/32/ is present
Note: "B"|"S" "XXX" "HQ"|"HK"|"NL"|"US"4!n corresponds to: B User-initiated Broadcast
S SWIFT-initiated Broadcast
XXX indicates an unsequenced Broadcast (i.e. for selected countries)
HQ Broadcast issued from La Hulpe
HK Broadcast issued from Hong Kong
NL Broadcast issued from Netherlands
US Broadcast issued from the United States
4!n 4 digit Broadcast number
Tag 133 may be repeated.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: original-broadcast-number
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Original broadcast number for broadcast sent to selected countries
Tag 133 can only be present if tag 130:/09/ or tag 130:/32/ is present
Note: "B"|"S" "XXX" "HQ"|"HK"|"NL"|"US"4!n corresponds to: B User-initiated Broadcast
S SWIFT-initiated Broadcast
XXX indicates an unsequenced Broadcast (i.e. for selected countries)
HQ Broadcast issued from La Hulpe
HK Broadcast issued from Hong Kong
NL Broadcast issued from Netherlands
US Broadcast issued from the United States
4!n 4 digit Broadcast number
Tag 133 may be repeated.

Validation.actionmessage: "Invalid Original Broadcast Number Sent To Selected Countries '" + $value + "'."
"Invalid Original Broadcast Number Sent To Selected Countries '" + $value + "'."
"Invalid Original Broadcast Number Sent To Selected Countries '" + $value + "'."

SystemField.Name: broadcast-requester
SystemField.description:
BIC of Broadcast Requester.
Name of Broadcast Requester.
City of Broadcast Requester.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: broadcast-requester
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
BIC of Broadcast Requester.
Name of Broadcast Requester.
City of Broadcast Requester.

SystemField.Name: broadcast-text
SystemField.description: Broadcast text is minimum 1 and up to n lines of 65 characters.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: broadcast-text
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Broadcast text is minimum 1 and up to n lines of 65 characters.

fieldvalidation.name: E1
fieldvalidation.comment: IF (tag130:/09/ ...) or (tag 130:/23/ ...) is present, then tag 132 or 133 but not both, must be used.
fieldvalidation.formula: If(StartsWith($value, "/09/") || StartsWith($value, "/32/"), If(original_broadcast_number_users.$size > 0, original_broadcast_number_countries.$size == 0, original_broadcast_number_countries.$size > 0), true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If (tag130:/09/..) or (tag130:/32/..)is present, then tag 132 or 133 but not both, must be used."

fieldvalidation.name: E2
fieldvalidation.comment:
Tag 132 can only be present if tag 130:/09/ or tag 130:/32/ is present.
Tag 132 may be repeated.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Tag 132 (Original Broadcast Number Users) can only be present if tag 130:/09/ or 130:/32/ is present"

fieldvalidation.name: E3
fieldvalidation.comment: Tag 133 can only be present if tag 130:/09/ or tag 130:/32/ is present
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Tag 133 (Original Broadcast Number Countriess) can only be present if tag 130:/09/ or 130:/32/ is present"
